files.README.md:
# Stripe Claude Code Plugins

A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins for Stripe developers. Build, debug, and integrate Stripe payments faster with AI-powered developer tools.

## ğŸ¯ Why This Marketplace?

This is a **focused collection** of plugins specifically for Stripe development:

- ğŸ¯ **Stripe-specific expertise** - Deep knowledge of Stripe APIs, webhooks, and patterns
- ğŸš€ **Faster development** - Generate production-ready code that follows Stripe best practices
- ğŸ› **Better debugging** - Expert diagnosis of common Stripe integration issues
- ğŸ“š **Best practices** - Security-first approach with proper signature verification
- ğŸ”„ **Always up-to-date** - Maintained by developers actively working with Stripe

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Installing the Marketplace

Add this marketplace to your Claude Code:

```
/plugin marketplace add whatnextjamie/stripe-claude-plugins
```

### Installing Plugins

Browse available plugins:

```
/plugin
```

Install a specific plugin:

```
/plugin install stripe-webhook-skills@stripe-plugins
```

## ğŸ“¦ Available Plugins

### stripe-webhook-skills

Expert Stripe webhook debugging and code generation capabilities.

**Features:**
- Debug webhook signature verification issues
- Analyze webhook event payloads
- Generate production-ready webhook handlers
- Framework support: Next.js, Express, FastAPI, Django
- Database integrations: Prisma, SQLAlchemy
- Complete with tests and documentation

**Install:**
```
/plugin install stripe-webhook-skills@stripe-plugins
```

**Repository:** [stripe-webhook-skills](https://github.com/whatnextjamie/stripe-webhook-skills)

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Want to add your Stripe-related plugin to this marketplace? We welcome contributions!

**See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for:**
- Plugin requirements and quality standards
- Step-by-step submission process
- Plugin structure examples
- Ideas for new plugins

**Quick summary:**
1. Create a Stripe-related Claude Code plugin
2. Fork this repo and add your plugin to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
3. Test installation from your fork
4. Submit a PR with plugin details

We review and merge quality plugins within a few days.

---

## ğŸ“š Resources

### Claude Code Documentation

- [Plugin Documentation](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/plugins)
- [Plugin Marketplaces](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/plugin-marketplaces)
- [Skills Documentation](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/skills)
- [Commands Documentation](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/commands)

### Example Plugins

- [stripe-webhook-skills](https://github.com/whatnextjamie/stripe-webhook-skills) - Skills-based plugin with comprehensive reference materials

---

## ğŸ” Marketplace Structure

```
stripe-claude-plugins/
â”œâ”€â”€ .claude-plugin/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json    # Plugin catalog
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md               # This file
â”œâ”€â”€ CONTRIBUTING.md         # How to contribute

```

---

## ğŸ—ºï¸ Roadmap

Future plugins planned for this marketplace:

### Webhooks & Events
- âœ… **stripe-webhook-skills** - Webhook debugging and code generation
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-event-inspector** - Advanced event payload analysis and testing

### API Integration
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-api-skills** - Payment Intent, Customer, and Subscription API helpers
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-connect-skills** - Stripe Connect platform integration

### Billing & Subscriptions
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-billing-skills** - Subscription lifecycle management
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-pricing-calculator** - Pricing model design and testing

### Testing & Security
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-test-generator** - Generate comprehensive Stripe integration tests
- ğŸ”œ **stripe-security-audit** - Security best practices checker

---

## ğŸ¤ Maintenance & Philosophy

This marketplace is actively maintained by [Jamie Thompson](https://github.com/whatnextjamie), a design engineer passionate about improving the Stripe development experience.

**Design Philosophy:**
- **Quality over quantity** - Only well-tested, production-ready plugins
- **Stripe-specific focus** - Deep domain expertise, not generic tools
- **Security first** - All plugins follow Stripe security best practices
- **Actively maintained** - Regular updates as Stripe APIs evolve
- **Community-driven** - Contributions welcome from Stripe developers

**Maintenance includes:**
- Keeping plugins updated with latest Stripe API versions
- Reviewing and testing plugin submissions
- Ensuring security and code quality standards
- Removing deprecated or broken plugins
- Responding to issues and feature requests

---

## âš ï¸ Disclaimer

Plugins in this marketplace are third-party extensions. While we review submissions for quality and security, use plugins at your own discretion. Always review plugin code before installation, especially in production environments.

---

## ğŸ“ License

This marketplace repository is licensed under the MIT License. Individual plugins may have different licenses - check each plugin's repository for details.

---

## ğŸ’¬ Support

- **Issues:** [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/whatnextjamie/stripe-claude-plugins/issues)
- **Discussions:** [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/whatnextjamie/stripe-claude-plugins/discussions)

---

**Built for the Claude Code community** ğŸš€
